9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: (Another chain) with similar (as no. 914) from Khilas:But he did not mention "from Ali

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الْحَلْقِ لِلنِّسَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked For Women To Shave
